ISSUE.TITLE: Microdata. Invalid object type for field "author" in review block
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 It seems that now it's necessary to follow the author schema when you use the author attribute https://schema.org/author. Also, there is no need to generate review microdata if reviews are disabled for the product. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/93737/invalid-object-type-for-field-author See also #6017

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6179 Don't use 'review' microdata when reviews are disabled for the product
#6179 Fixed problems with googles latest microdata (#6017)
